description_text:
My basement flooded recently and my control box seems to be not working but
I'm not sure. It's the older transparent control box. Is it normal if the
lights are red in it when I plug it in or should they be green ?

conversations.body_text: Hi Eric Boyer,  You can use a hair dryer to dry it thoroughly, then test it again. The default red setting should work without any issues. If it still doesn't function properly, you can visit our official website to purchase a PlusX or ProX Ultra controller—both models support VAM and VAM Pro motors.
